BEGIN
    -- تقليل عدد الاختبارات للمعلم (لا يقل عن صفر)
    UPDATE profiles 
    SET exam_count = GREATEST(COALESCE(exam_count, 0) - 1, 0),
        updated_at = NOW()
    WHERE id = OLD.created_by;
    
    RETURN OLD;
END;

name: source_code
details:
{"config": ["search_path=public"], "language": "plpgsql", "signature": "handle_new_user()", "return_type": "trigger", "source_length": 542, "source_preview": "
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO public.profiles (id, email, name, role, role_selected)
    VALUES (
        NEW.id,
        NEW.email,
        COALESCE(NEW.raw_user_meta_data->>'name', split_part(NEW.email, '@', 1)),
        COALESCE((NEW.raw_user_meta_data->>'role')::user_role, 'student'),
        COALESCE((NEW.raw_user_meta_data->>'role_selected')::boolean, FALSE)
    )
    ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
        email = EXCLUDED.email,
        name = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.name, profiles.name),
        updated_at = NOW();
    
    RETURN NEW;
END;
", "full_definition": "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.handle_new_user()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO public.profiles (id, email, name, role, role_selected)
    VALUES (
        NEW.id,
        NEW.email,
        COALESCE(NEW.raw_user_meta_data->>'name', split_part(NEW.email, '@', 1)),
        COALESCE((NEW.raw_user_meta_data->>'role')::user_role, 'student'),
        COALESCE((NEW.raw_user_meta_data->>'role_selected')::boolean, FALSE)
    )
    ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
        email = EXCLUDED.email,
        name = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.name, profiles.name),
        updated_at = NOW();
    
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$
", "transform_types": null, "argument_defaults": null}

name: source_code
details:
{"config": null, "language": "plpgsql", "signature": "increment_exam_count()", "return_type": "trigger", "source_length": 197, "source_preview": "
BEGIN
    -- زيادة عدد الاختبارات للمعلم
    UPDATE profiles 
    SET exam_count = COALESCE(exam_count, 0) + 1,
        updated_at = NOW()
    WHERE id = NEW.created_by;
    
    RETURN NEW;
END;
", "full_definition": "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.increment_exam_count()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- زيادة عدد الاختبارات للمعلم
    UPDATE profiles 
    SET exam_count = COALESCE(exam_count, 0) + 1,
        updated_at = NOW()
    WHERE id = NEW.created_by;
    
    RETURN NEW;
END;
